snippet: In September 2012, a family that was already marred by poverty and mental illness lost its beloved matriarch. Three siblings are now trying to mend their once-strong bond.
abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies provides siblings Johantzen Valdez, Jasmine Morales and Desiree Roman, with $1,700 from the fund for new beds and living room furniture for their Bronx apartment.
lead_paragraph: In September 2012, a family that was already marred by poverty and mental illness lost its beloved matriarch. Three siblings are now trying to mend their once-strong bond.

headline.main: After a Loss, Siblings Try to Reconnect
headline.print_headline: After a Loss, Siblings Try to Reconnect
